title: [Large-Scale] Mobile-Based Language Learning Design: Utilizing Best-Worst Scaling (BWS)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills, elementary-level language comprehension
context.additional_context: Enhancing competency in designing language learning activities within smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply authenticity-based principles with over 80% accuracy when designing language learning tasks in mobile environments
Learners can identify at least three personalization requirements in mobile learning design using the Best-Worst Scaling (BWS) method
Learners can develop and evaluate two types of language learning mobile activities feasible in limited technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
